ygData.subject: RE: FLOWING BLACK SILK SASH TEST
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I thought Radia paid 9000 pp for it, or was it 10000?  By the way, Radia is not a twink, she made all her fortune via trading/buying/selling.  Last I know
ygData.messageBody:
>8)Another note on the sash, while the test posted showed it with a L27
>8)bard, you can forget getting one until you can take a tough group of
>8)L45+ players into lower guk, unless your guild is very pro-twinking.
>
> Or you're willing to pay some 10,000 plat for one. :)
>

I thought Radia paid 9000 pp for it, or was it 10000? By the way, Radia is
not a twink, she made all her fortune via trading/buying/selling. Last I
know she wasn't even in a guild. So it is possible for a non-guild twinked
character to get all those nice equipments at that level.
